00257   bool parseEmfObject(const std::string& objectSerialized, T*& object_ptr, const std::string msgComp=std::string()) {
00258 
00259     object_ptr = NULL;
00260     try {
00261       //CREATE DATA MODEL
00262       T tmpObject;
00263       ecore::EPackage_ptr ecorePackage = tmpObject._eClass()->getEPackage();
00264       ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository::_instance()->load(ecorePackage);
00265 
00266       //Parse the model
00267       ecorecpp::parser::parser parser;
00268       object_ptr = parser.load_str(objectSerialized)->as< T >();
00269     }
00270     catch (std::exception& e) {
00271       return false;
00272     }
00273     return true;
